page.title: 09 Bevois Town School
page.content:
There has been a school on the present site since before the war. We found that many older local people went to the school. They and the local shop-keepers are very kind to us and are pleased to help us when we have jumble sales, summer fairs and so on.
At school we have many different sorts of assemblies. In November we have a Divali assembly when we remember the story of Rama and Sita and the festival of light. We make little lights with candles. In December we enjoy the story of the birth of Jesus, and we have parties. At the end of Ramadhan we celebrate Eid.
